page.title: 11Leisure and Recreation
page.content: I am a ten year old girl.In my spare time,I might ring my friend and ask if she can play. If she can play, we might go to the Lawn and play tennis or on the swings, or on the slide. After tea I might take the dog for a walk down to the Lawn. On Wednesday afternoons I go horse riding for half an hour, at Harston. In the summer holiays there is a Holiday Club that any child can go to. There are lots of activities, like art and craft, cooking, jazz dance and drama. I sometimes go over to my auntie Trudy's house and sleep the night. My auntie Trudy sometimes takes me swimming at Cambridge swimming pool, at Park Side.
